channel.title: Portforwarding for my server
channel.description: I know something about runescape and java coding but, when I use the client it says error connecting to the server. I followed all the directions. I know I have to portforward. But, I have a wire router. my type of router is 2700HG-B Gateway. I have gone to portforward.com to look for a tutorial. I have done this before for a game called byond. But, for this one I can't find a runescape option. Can someone help me out plz. What tutorial do I choose? :confused:
